DOC.detailed_description: Three cohort participate outcome evaluation SOS suicide prevention program assess effect help-seeking , attitude toward depression suicide , suicidal behavior . The first two cohort consist 25 public state high school Massachusetts , Georgia , Connecticut . The third cohort consist 9 middle school 10 high school outside Connecticut high proportion military dependant . Hypotheses : H1 : Exposure SOS program significantly associate low rate suicidal ideation suicide attempt ; great level help-seeking ; great knowledge adaptive attitude toward depression suicide ; increase communication perceive support peer . H2 : The reduction suicide attempt among youth expose program explain increase knowledge depression suicide , favorable attitude regard suicide , improve communication support peer . Methods 1 . The intervention : The SOS program present student 2 consecutive class 2 day period , typically health social study class . The SOS program 's teaching material include video discussion guide . The video include dramatization depict sign suicidality depression , recommend way react someone depressed suicidal , well interview real people whose life touch suicide . Students also ask complete Brief Screen Adolescent Depression ( BSAD ) , brief screen instrument depression derive Diagnostic Interview Schedule Children IV ( Lucas et al. , 2001 ) . 2 . The sample : The first cohort involve approximately 4000 student 9 high school Columbus Georgia , Hartford Connecticut , western Massachusetts two-year period . The second cohort consist ove additional 1100 student recruit 16 Technical High Schools Connecticut . A third cohort consist 600 student 9 middle school 10 high school outside Connecticut high proportion military dependant . 3 . The research design : The experimental design evaluation randomize control group design posttest data collection . At begin school year approximately half class teacher present program randomly assign treatment group , receive SOS Prevention Program fall/winter year ; half assign control group , receive program evaluation complete . To ascertain effect program participant ' knowledge attitude toward suicide help seek behavior , student treatment control group ask complete short questionnaire 3 month follow implementation program .
